item.title: Display Jupyter Notebooks with Academic
item.description: Learn how to blog in Academic using Jupyter notebooks

#Create a free website with Academic using Markdown, Jupyter, or RStudio. Choose a beautiful color theme and build anything with the Page Builder - over 40 widgets, themes, and language packs included! #Check out the latest demo of what you’ll get in less than 10 minutes, or view the showcase of personal, project, and business sites. #- Setup Academic #- Get Started #- View the documentation #- Ask a question #- Request a feature or report a bug #- Updating?
